trans-unit.source: The DROP TYPE statement removes a user-defined type (UDT) that was created using a <xref href="rrefsqljcreatetype.dita#rrefsqljcreatetype"></xref>.

seg-source.mrk: The DROP TYPE statement removes a user-defined type (UDT) that was created using a <xref href="rrefsqljcreatetype.dita#rrefsqljcreatetype"></xref>.

target.mrk: The DROP TYPE statement removes a user-defined type (UDT) that was created using a <xref href="rrefsqljcreatetype.dita#rrefsqljcreatetype"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: The RESTRICT keyword is required. CASCADE semantics are not supported. That is, <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> will not track down and drop orphaned objects.

seg-source.mrk: That is, <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> will not track down and drop orphaned objects.

target.mrk: That is, <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> will not track down and drop orphaned objects.

trans-unit.source: Dropping a UDT implicitly drops all USAGE privileges that reference it.

seg-source.mrk: Dropping a UDT implicitly drops all USAGE privileges that reference it.

target.mrk: Dropping a UDT implicitly drops all USAGE privileges that reference it.

trans-unit.source: You cannot drop a type if it would make another SQL object unusable. This includes the following restrictions:

seg-source.mrk: You cannot drop a type if it would make another SQL object unusable.

target.mrk: You cannot drop a type if it would make another SQL object unusable.

trans-unit.source: Table columns: No table columns have this UDT.

seg-source.mrk: Table columns: No table columns have this UDT.

target.mrk: Table columns: No table columns have this UDT.

trans-unit.source: Views: No view definition involves expressions which have this UDT.

seg-source.mrk: Views: No view definition involves expressions which have this UDT.

target.mrk: Views: No view definition involves expressions which have this UDT.

trans-unit.source: Triggers: No trigger definition involves expressions which have this UDT.

seg-source.mrk: Triggers: No trigger definition involves expressions which have this UDT.

target.mrk: Triggers: No trigger definition involves expressions which have this UDT.

trans-unit.source: Constraints: No constraints reference expressions of this UDT.

seg-source.mrk: Constraints: No constraints reference expressions of this UDT.

target.mrk: Constraints: No constraints reference expressions of this UDT.

trans-unit.source: Generated columns: No generated columns reference expressions of this UDT.

seg-source.mrk: Generated columns: No generated columns reference expressions of this UDT.

target.mrk: Generated columns: No generated columns reference expressions of this UDT.

trans-unit.source: Routines: No functions or procedures have arguments or return values of this UDT.

seg-source.mrk: Routines: No functions or procedures have arguments or return values of this UDT.

target.mrk: Routines: No functions or procedures have arguments or return values of this UDT.

trans-unit.source: Table Functions: No table functions return tables with columns of this UDT.

seg-source.mrk: Table Functions: No table functions return tables with columns of this UDT.

target.mrk: Table Functions: No table functions return tables with columns of this UDT.
